subject: Football (College)
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Football
lead_paragraph: The judge in the concussion settlement case took exception to a clause that would keep players who receive a cash payout from suing the N.C.A.A.
snippet: The judge in the concussion settlement case took exception to a clause that would keep players who receive a cash payout from suing the N.C.A.A.
